entry.title: Frax Founder Pins $25B Stablecoin Supply Drop on Fed Rate Hikes
entry.summary: The market capitalization of dollar-pegged stablecoins has dropped by $25B in the wake of Terra's collapse.

entry.title: Crypto Markets Stabilize After $693B Sell-Off
entry.summary: Crypto markets have stabilized, ending a market free-fall that erased $693B from crypto’s market capitalization from May 5 to May 12. Crypto’s market capitalization fell from $1.81T on May 5 to lows of $1.12T on May 12. The market started to rise on Friday, and now rests at $1.28T, data from CoinMarketCap shows. The crash … Crypto Markets Stabilize After $693B Sell-Off Read More »

entry.title: Norway’s Central Bank Taps Ethereum Layer 2 For CBDC Trial
entry.summary: Norway’s central bank is embracing Ethereum’s Layer 2 for its central bank digital currency (CBDC) pilot. On May 16, Nahmii, an Ethereum L2, announced it had been tapped by Norges bank to host the sandbox for the country’s national currency, the krone. Nahmii said in a statement that it will “build, maintain, and train Norges … Norway’s Central Bank Taps Ethereum Layer 2 For CBDC Trial Read More »

entry.title: VillageDAO Aims To Decentralize Customer Service
entry.summary: ConsenSys-backed VillageDAO will provide customer care services to other web3 projects – with the first client being Metamask.
